title: Is This Mom Setting Her Daughter Up For Failure By Doing This?
description:
There's a 14-year-old on Instagram with over 100,000 followers. Per week, she gains 5,000 followers, and on average, her picture will receive nearly 90,000 likes.
Kristin knows for a fact that something is off about this account. Her theory is that the girl's mother is BUYING her followers! If this is true, is the mom in the wrong for doing this? We discuss.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
